info.title: Catalogue
info.description: REST Web Service to search and retrieve physical library items and item availability at NLB's libraries.

get.summary: Searching catalogue content according to search criteria
get.description: This function may be used to search for titles using query parameter.

parameters.name: Keywords
parameters.description: Keywords can be BRN/ISBN/Title/Author/Subject.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: Refer to title response element "source"

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Number of records to return.

parameters.name: SortFields
parameters.description:
Supported values are relevancy, newmaterial, publicationDate.

Note: Do URL encode the value.

  • Use prefix + or - to sort by ascending or descending and comma(,) separated for multiple sort fields.
  • relevancy
  • newmaterial
  • +publicationDate
  • -publicationDate

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Offset used to retrieve subsequent records set by pagination

parameters.name: MaterialTypes
parameters.description:
Please refer to the response "facets" and get the id values to pass in the parameter.

Sample Value:

  • bks
  • ebk
  • dvd

parameters.name: IntendedAudiences
parameters.description:
Please refer to the response "facets" and get the id values to pass in the parameter.

Sample Value:

  • adult
  • junior

parameters.name: DateFrom
parameters.description: Publish Year

parameters.name: DateTo
parameters.description: Publish Year

parameters.name: Locations
parameters.description:
Please refer to the response "facets" and get the id values to pass in the parameter.

Sample Value:

  • amkpl
  • sbpl
  • trl

parameters.name: Languages
parameters.description:
Please refer to the response "facets" and get the id values to pass in the parameter.

Sample Value:

  • eng
  • chi

get.summary: Searching catalogue content according to search criteria
get.description:
This function may be used to search for titles using query parameter.

This function provide multiple combination search, they will be processed with AND operation.

The request must contain at least one of the Keywords, ISBN, Author, Subject or Title.

parameters.name: Keywords
parameters.description:
Keywords can be Title/Author/Subject/ISBN.

If the keyword is present, other parameters will be ignored.

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description: Title

parameters.name: Author
parameters.description: Author name.

parameters.name: Subject
parameters.description: Subject

parameters.name: ISBN
parameters.description: The standardised 10-digit or 13-digit international number that uniquely identifies a monographic publication

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Number of records to return.

parameters.name: SortFields
parameters.description:
Supported values are relevancy, newmaterial, publicationDate.

Note: Do URL encode the value.

  • Use prefix + or - to sort by ascending or descending and comma(,) separated for multiple sort fields.
  • relevancy
  • newmaterial
  • +publicationDate
  • -publicationDate

parameters.name: SetId
parameters.description: SetId used to retrieve subsequent records set by pagination.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Offset used to retrieve subsequent records set by pagination

get.summary: Getting the detailed information of an item
get.description:
This function may be used to retrieve the title information.

At least one of the search fields is required:

  • BRN
  • ISBN

parameters.name: BRN
parameters.description: Book reference number

parameters.name: ISBN
parameters.description: The standardised 10-digit or 13-digit international number that uniquely identifies a monographic publication

get.summary: Checking whether the item is available for loan
get.description:
This function may be used to retrieve the circulation item(s) detail for the title.

At least one of the search fields is required:

  • BRN
  • ISBN

parameters.name: LocationCode
parameters.description: Location code please refer to table T001.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Number of records to return.

parameters.name: SortFields
parameters.description:
Note: Do URL encode the value.

  • Use prefix + or - to sort by ascending or descending and comma(,) separated for multiple sort fields.
  • +locationCode
  • -locationCode

parameters.name: SetId
parameters.description: SetId used to retrieve subsequent records set by pagination.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: offset used to retrieve subsequent records set by pagination

parameters.name: BRN
parameters.description: Book reference number

parameters.name: ISBN
parameters.description: The standardised 10-digit or 13-digit international number that uniquely identifies a monographic publication

get.summary: This function may be used to browse the new arrival titles.
get.description: This function may be used to Get the New titles using query parameter.

parameters.name: DateRange
parameters.description: Supported values are Quarterly, Monthly, Weekly.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Number of records to return.

parameters.name: SortFields
parameters.description:
Supported values are relevancy, newmaterial, publicationDate.

Note: Do URL encode the value.

  • Use prefix + or - to sort by ascending or descending and comma(,) separated for multiple sort fields.
  • relevancy
  • newmaterial
  • +publicationDate
  • -publicationDate

parameters.name: SetId
parameters.description: SetId used to retrieve subsequent records set by pagination.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: offset used to retrieve subsequent records set by pagination

parameters.name: MaterialTypes
parameters.description:
Please refer to the response "facets" and get the id values to pass in the parameter.

Sample Value:

  • bks
  • ebk
  • dvd

parameters.name: IntendedAudiences
parameters.description:
Please refer to the response "facets" and get the id values to pass in the parameter.

Sample Value:

  • adult
  • junior

parameters.name: DateFrom
parameters.description: Publish Year

parameters.name: DateTo
parameters.description: Publish Year

parameters.name: Locations
parameters.description:
Please refer to the response "facets" and get the id values to pass in the parameter.

Sample Value:

  • amkpl
  • sbpl
  • trl

parameters.name: Languages
parameters.description:
Please refer to the response "facets" and get the id values to pass in the parameter.

get.summary: This function may be used to search and retrieve statistics of most checkout trends titles and filter by location.
get.description: This function may be used to retrieve the most checkout trends titles by location.

parameters.name: LocationCode
parameters.description: Location code to return most Checkouts titles from this location. Refer to table T001.

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description:
Duration to return most Checkouts titles.

Available values : past30days, pastmonth

statusCode.description: The status code of the error.

BadRequestError.description: Error contents including the specific error

BibFormat.description: Bibliographic Formats. Please refer to code list C001.

language.description: Language are are English, Chinese, Malay, Tamil..

ageLevel.description: ageLevel  A - Adult ,* Y - Young, *J - Juni0r.

id.description: facet name identifier to use in the query string parameter

name.description: facet name to display in the UI.

id.description: facet data identifier to use the query string parameter.

data.description: facet data name to display in the UI.

totalRecords.description: Total number of records for this search(dataset).

count.description: Number of records returned in the response.

hasMoreRecords.description: Indicator - if dataset has more records or not for pagination.

nextRecordsOffset.description: Value to pass in Offset parameter to navigate to next page.

digitalId.description: For external query purpose, to get the title or reserve the title in Overdrive

isbns.description: Bibliographic International Standard Book Number identifiers.

issns.description: Bibliographic International Standard Serial Number identifiers.

edition.description: Information relating to the edition of a work.

nativeEdition.description: Information relating to the edition of a work(Native language).

nativeSummary.description: Summary of the bibliographic content(Native language).

nativeNotes.description: Native notes of the bibliographic record.

allowReservation.description: Allow to place reservation or not.

isRestricted.description: true, when title is marked as restricted publication.

activeReservationsCount.description: Number of reservations placed and in queue, not fullfilled and not expired.

audienceImda.description: target audience - Marc tag 521 Ind 3 - Specific to highlight in display.

availability.description: true when at least 1 item is "available" status.

title.description: Full title (with author info suffixed by /) of the bibliographic record.

nativeTitle.description: Full title (with author info suffixed by /) of the bibliographic record(Native language).

author.example: Song bing wu de yi xiang shi jie.

totalRecords.description: Total number of records for this search(dataset).

count.description: Number of records returned in the response.

hasMoreRecords.description: Indicator - if dataset has more records or not for pagination.

nextRecordsOffset.description: Value to pass in Offset parameter to navigate to next page.
